citation.name: J. Biol. Chem.
citation.title: Periaxin and AHNAK nucleoprotein 2 form intertwined homodimers through domain swapping.

comment.text: Homodimer (via PDZ domain) (PubMed:24675079). Interacts with DYSF; the interaction is direct and Ca(2+)-independent (PubMed:17185750).

property.value: Expressed in tendon of biceps brachii and 204 other tissues

feature.description: Glycyl lysine isopeptide (Lys-Gly) (interchain with G-Cter in SUMO2)
